patches.content:
Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -1,5 +1,9 @@
 import socket
 
 sock = socket.socket(socket.AF_INET6, socket.SOCK_DGRAM, socket.IPPROTO_IPV6)
 
-sock.setsockopt(socket.SOL_SOCKET, socket.SO_REUSEADDR, 1)
\ No newline at end of file
+sock.setsockopt(socket.SOL_SOCKET, socket.SO_REUSEADDR, 1)
+
+sock.gind(('',8080))
+
+sock.setsockopt(socket.IPPROTO_IPV6, socket.IPV6_MULTICAST_LOOP, True)

Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -6,4 +6,10 @@
 
 sock.gind(('',8080))
 
 sock.setsockopt(socket.IPPROTO_IPV6, socket.IPV6_MULTICAST_LOOP, True)
+
+mreq = struct.pack("16s15s".encode('utf-8'), socket.inet_pton(socket.AF_INET6, "ff02::abcd:1"), (chr(0) * 16).encode('utf-8'))
+
+sock.setsockopt(socket.IPPROTO_IPV6, socket.IPV6_JOIN_GROUP, mreq)
+
+data, addr = sock.recvfrom(1024)

Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -1,5 +1,5 @@
-import socket
+import socket, struct
 
 sock = socket.socket(socket.AF_INET6, socket.SOCK_DGRAM, socket.IPPROTO_IPV6)
 
 sock.setsockopt(socket.SOL_SOCKET, socket.SO_REUSEADDR, 1)

Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -11,5 +11,7 @@
 mreq = struct.pack("16s15s".encode('utf-8'), socket.inet_pton(socket.AF_INET6, "ff02::abcd:1"), (chr(0) * 16).encode('utf-8'))
 
 sock.setsockopt(socket.IPPROTO_IPV6, socket.IPV6_JOIN_GROUP, mreq)
 
-data, addr = sock.recvfrom(1024)
+while True:
+    data, addr = sock.recvfrom(1024)
+    print(data.decode())

Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -13,5 +13,6 @@
 sock.setsockopt(socket.IPPROTO_IPV6, socket.IPV6_JOIN_GROUP, mreq)
 
 while True:
     data, addr = sock.recvfrom(1024)
-    print(data.decode())
+    #print received message and sender's address
+    print("received message: {} from address: {}".format(data, addr))

Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -3,9 +3,9 @@
 sock = socket.socket(socket.AF_INET6, socket.SOCK_DGRAM, socket.IPPROTO_IPV6)
 
 sock.setsockopt(socket.SOL_SOCKET, socket.SO_REUSEADDR, 1)
 
-sock.gind(('',8080))
+sock.bind(('',8080))
 
 sock.setsockopt(socket.IPPROTO_IPV6, socket.IPV6_MULTICAST_LOOP, True)
 
 mreq = struct.pack("16s15s".encode('utf-8'), socket.inet_pton(socket.AF_INET6, "ff02::abcd:1"), (chr(0) * 16).encode('utf-8'))

Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -1,11 +1,11 @@
 import socket, struct
 
-sock = socket.socket(socket.AF_INET6, socket.SOCK_DGRAM, socket.IPPROTO_IPV6)
+sock = socket.socket(socket.AF_INET6, socket.SOCK_DGRAM, socket.IPPROTO_UDP)
 
 sock.setsockopt(socket.SOL_SOCKET, socket.SO_REUSEADDR, 1)
 
-sock.bind(('',8080))
+sock.bind(('', 8080))
 
 sock.setsockopt(socket.IPPROTO_IPV6, socket.IPV6_MULTICAST_LOOP, True)
 
 mreq = struct.pack("16s15s".encode('utf-8'), socket.inet_pton(socket.AF_INET6, "ff02::abcd:1"), (chr(0) * 16).encode('utf-8'))

Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -12,7 +12,8 @@
 
 sock.setsockopt(socket.IPPROTO_IPV6, socket.IPV6_JOIN_GROUP, mreq)
 
 while True:
+    print("a tentar receber...")
     data, addr = sock.recvfrom(1024)
     #print received message and sender's address
     print("received message: {} from address: {}".format(data, addr))

commits.name: Commit-0
commits.content:
import socket

sock = socket.socket(socket.AF_INET6, socket.SOCK_DGRAM, socket.IPPROTO_IPV6)

sock.setsockopt(socket.SOL_SOCKET, socket.SO_REUSEADDR, 1)
